channel.title: linux on Karl's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Karl's Blog

item.title: My Linux Journey so far
item.author: karl.hepworth@gmail.com (Karl Hepworth)
item.description: I won’t lie, when I started my current career I was a Windows guy, which now seems blasphemous to me. I was introduced to MacOS when my career shifted into the development space. I wanted to be in the development space so the shift was very intentional, but I started out publishing content & administering websites. Little did I know at the time how much more I hungered for. I was very uncomfortable with MacOS at first, but I wasn’t strictly opposed, and I eventually learnt to love MacOS.

item.title: Year of the Linux desktop
item.author: karl.hepworth@gmail.com (Karl Hepworth)
item.description: About five years ago my life was transformed when a certain video game was released. It was around this time I was exploring the idea of how I could move away from using Microsoft products. However the two options I had weren’t appropriate enough. Mac simply was hopeless when it came to gaming and Linux wasn’t… mature enough, in that space. It was however on a trajectory so timing wasn’t favourable.
